collectionMetadata.name: Patents Applied, Awarded and Owned by Sector
collectionMetadata.description:
To collect data that provide useful indication on the scale and direction of R&D in Singapore. This will facilitate the development of national science and technology policies and programmes, which will benefit the whole R&D community. 

For more information, please refer to https://www.a-star.edu.sg/News-and-Events/publications
sources: Agency For Science, Technology and Research
collectionMetadata.managedBy: Agency For Science, Technology and Research
